name: quick-mongo-rest-server
author: Brad Newman <bradjnewman@gmail.com> (http://bradjnewman.com)
description: A quick REST server with all verbs available that will interact with Mongodb.

scripts.start-server: npm run build-server && npm run watch-server build-server && npm run serve -server
scripts.mongo-mac: npm run kill-mongo && mkdir server/mongo-db; mongod --dbpath server/mongo-db
scripts.mongo-win: npm run kill-mongo && md server/mongo-db & "C:/Program Files/MongoDb/Server/3.2/bin/mongod.exe" --dbpath server/mongo-db
